name: Psychopomp Angel
description: The Psychopomp Angel embodies guidance and protection in the afterlife, showcasing a celestial form with potential glowing features, standing ready to assist souls transitioning between worlds.
memorable: Its unique ability to manipulate the conditions of others and protect allies makes it a significant presence on the battlefield, transcending its physical form.
goals: To guide and protect souls in their transition between the realms, while maintaining order and balance.
relations: May serve deities related to the afterlife, could be found alongside other celestial beings or guardians.
environment: Typically found in the realms of the afterlife or places where guidance and protection are needed.
strengths: Has resistance to necrotic and radiant damage, along with condition immunities that enhance its survivability.
weaknesses: Reliance on specific spells makes it vulnerable to effects that can bypass its defenses.
attacks: Employs its multiattack with Lantern Flail for both bludgeoning and radiant damage, enhancing attacks against fiends and undead.
most_powerful_ability: Divine Dictum can deal significant radiant damage in an area and potentially free allies from harmful mental conditions.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and has a passive Perception score of 15, indicating average detection capabilities.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, allowing for decent awareness of hidden threats.
additional_information: Can adapt radiant damage to necrotic when advantageous.
Immortal nature allows it to remain active without physical needs.
Can mask its celestial nature in environments dominated by fiends.
Grants temporary hit points and protection from undead and fiend attacks with Spirit Usher.
Carries the authority of its patron deity, allowing it to free souls from binding contracts.
